title: HOUR 1: Jon Paul Morosi and The Lakers Show Some Life
itunes:title: HOUR 1: Jon Paul Morosi and The Lakers Show Some Life
description:
Jason Smith and Rob Parker sit in for Dan Patrick and weigh in on the Los Angeles Lakers thumping the Trail Blazers in Game 2 of their opening-round series. Plus, FOX Sports MLB reporter Jon Paul Morosi joins the guys to discuss the week that was in Major League Baseball and the future for Reds broadcaster Thom Brenneman. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
